name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 - Part I : The Spy Of Chichester And The Eager Tourist Guide
storyline: The protagonist is unaware of his/her true location, thinking it's still somewhere in America. When faced with the truth, the protagonist has a hard time adjusting to the situation, requiring drastic help from the protagonist's nemesis and over-eager tourist guide. However, there may be more going on than meets the eye.
summary: The first part of the second episode of the Welcome To... Chichester trilogy, and details your first day on holiday in Chichester, England

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: New video trailer for Welcome To... Chichester 2 : The Spy Of Chichester And The Eager Tourist Guide
